He has been recognized by his peers as one of the most knowledgeable and innovative Management executives and is named as a Europe’s youngest management Guru.

He specializes in advising clients on creating funding programs for a wide variety of e-commerce assets, structuring efficient asset disposition methods, valuing performing and non-performing portfolios, and the economic consequences of government policies and regulations impacting financial institutions and broker/dealers.

He is an acknowledged authority on administrative, financial, and service departments, including marketing, communications, and strategic planning.
